name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
J-20 chief designer Yang Wei and general manager Hao Zhaoping were dismissed, and the management of China Aviation Industry Corporation continued to adjust.
According to Caixin.com, the leadership team column of AVIC's official website changed on Saturday night, and Hao Zhaoping and Yang Wei's resumes were removed.
Public information shows that Yang Wei is 62 years old this year. At the age of 37, he became China's youngest aircraft chief designer. In 2018, he became the deputy general manager of AVIC. He also served as the chief designer of China's fifth-generation fighter J-20.
Hao Zhaoping is 57 years old this year. He has worked in the aerospace industry system for many years since 1994 and was promoted to general manager in 2022.
Previously, Tan Ruisong, the former chairman of AVIC, was dismissed in March 2023. Later, he was investigated by the official notification in August last year for suspected violations of discipline and law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 20, TikTok issued a statement saying: TikTok is resuming service in accordance with the agreement reached with our service providers. We thank President Trump for providing the necessary clarity and assurances to our service providers to ensure that they will not face any penalties when providing TikTok services to more than 170 million American users, while also allowing more than 7 million small businesses to prosper.
This is a strong defense of the First Amendment and a firm opposition to arbitrary censorship. We will work with President Trump to seek a long-term solution to ensure that TikTok can continue to stay in the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives' Ad Hoc Committee on China wrote to the Thai ambassador to the United States, urging the Thai government not to repatriate Uyghurs who have fled China and are in its custody, as they are likely to be sent to concentration camps; and stressed that those who assist the Chinese Communist Party in trampling on human rights should face U.S. sanctions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 18, at the EDC festival in Thailand, fans waved the Chinese and Republic of China flags, and then a Chinese fan stepped forward and grabbed the Republic of China flag from a Taiwanese fan and threw it away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 20, Fan Weiqiu was executed for driving a car into pedestrians in Zhuhai, killing 35 and injuring 43; Xu Jiajin, the murderer of the Wuxi university slashing case that killed 8 and injured 17, was executed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 19, Musk tweeted that the current situation where TikTok is allowed to operate in the United States, but X is not allowed to operate in China needs to change.
On January 20, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded: The Chinese government manages the Internet in accordance with the law. As long as they abide by Chinese laws and regulations and provide safe and reliable products and services, we welcome Internet companies from all countries to develop in China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 20 (Release) Shenzhen, Guangdong. A merchant applied for the "Gantang Yunjie" trademark, but was rejected by the Trademark Office on the grounds that "the "Gantang" contained in the mark is the name of 30 female soldiers who followed the Central Red Army on the Long March. If it is used as a trademark, it is easy for the public to associate it with the Red Army soldiers, which will damage the reputation of the Red Army soldiers and the public's patriotic feelings. It cannot be used as a trademark."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, American construction worker Kegan Sunell replied on Xiaohongshu that he earns $50 per hour and about $1,200 per week.
At present, this reply has been deleted. According to Kegan Sunell, the reply was not deleted by himself, but by the platform.
Some netizens also reminded him in the comment area not to discuss salary anymore, otherwise his account might be banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 16, the National Center for Disease Control and Prevention issued a notice: All COVID-19 nucleic acid tests should be conducted! All fever clinics should be set up and opened, and the implementation of "examination before diagnosis and treatment" is encouraged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 18, a Shanghai elderly man passed away with 4.3 million yuan and a property left uninherited. His cousin sued the Civil Affairs Bureau to inherit the elderly man's estate. The court decided to give him 1.3 million yuan, and the remaining deposits and houses were deemed unowned and reclaimed by the state.
Ms. Zhao died of illness and left millions of inheritance. The court decided to reclaim the property and the relatives helped Ms. Zhao, so the remaining property can be distributed in proportion.
Netizen: "Isn't this just robbing money?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 20 (Release) Sichuan Zigong. An urban management official car was used for private purposes to send a child to school and was photographed.
Official response: Deduct 5 points from the driver's assessment score, cancel the 200 yuan subsidy, and inform the entire team.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of January 20, in Nanning, Guangxi, contractors and workers gathered in front of the Guangxi Daily News Agency to demand the project payment that had been in arrears for many years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
During the two sessions in Shanghai, 20 CPPCC members from several tertiary hospitals in Shanghai jointly proposed a motion, bluntly stating the unstable efficacy of the drugs purchased through centralized procurement.
According to a report on January 20, the National Health Insurance Administration will rush to Shanghai tomorrow to listen to doctors' feedback on the efficacy of centralized procurement drugs in person.
Netizens said: "The National Health Insurance Administration did not conduct any research and confirmation on the efficacy of drugs before implementing centralized procurement?"
"I hope they are not here to ask for punishment"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 19, Zhoukou, Henan. Ms. Gu said that she had double eyelid suture surgery in 2020. Recently, she rubbed a curved needle from the end of her eye. After checking, she found that it was a needle used for double eyelid surgery.
According to her recollection, the person who performed the surgery was a novice, and the boss was guiding her. After the surgery, she heard a discussion in a low voice.
At present, Ms. Gu contacted the boss but received no response, and the doctor who performed the surgery did not admit it, and now he does not reply to messages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Professor Ouyang Haifeng of Xi'an International Medical Center Hospital talks about how he chooses "original drugs" or "generic drugs", and what the difference is between "original drugs" and "generic drugs".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The feelings of Chinese netizens and American "TikTok refugees" after checking accounts:
"The United States is really a ninja among ninjas. Their capitalists want to tax the air as well"
"The United States needs a revolution now. It turns out that there are really developed countries with systems that are cannibalistic"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Banning "malicious memories" 
A netizen posted a cover of the 2020 New Weekly magazine, which was related to the Wuhan lockdown, but was deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 20, China News Network: Take the path of your choice, don’t choose the path that is easy to walk, good morning.
Netizens responded: “No problem, they keep the easy path for themselves”
“Just say that cattle and horses don’t deserve to have a smooth passage”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Full text of the National Center for Disease Control and Prevention notice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Washington Post: The 8th Special Operations Force of Ukraine captured North Korean military trophies in combat: AK-12 rifles, handwritten speeches by Kim Jong-un, first aid manuals, Russian dictionaries with Korean phonetic symbols, and a notebook, one page of which contained lyrics: "I love my motherland, I can't live for a moment without you"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 19, a blogger forwarded a Bloomberg report about Vietnam's massive government downsizing plan. Not only was he unable to comment, but his previous comments were also hidden by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 20 (Released) Nantong, Jiangsu. A man said that he was a contract English teacher. He was dismissed in 2001 and then rehired. However, he found that the wife of the township leader joined the school in the year he was dismissed. However, he only had a correspondence degree and no teaching experience, but he was exempted from the examination and was enrolled. His monthly salary was close to 20,000 yuan, and his current pension was close to 10,000 yuan. The man was indignant about this and reported it to his superiors. He was also detained and released on bail for one year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Wall Street Journal: U.S. President-elect Trump hopes to visit China within 100 days of taking office, according to people familiar with the discussions.
The Wall Street Journal added that Trump and Xi Jinping discussed a face-to-face meeting through their representatives, and one option is for Trump to invite Xi Jinping to visit the United States.
The Chinese Embassy in Washington did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 20, Wuhan Baijia Maternity Hospital closed down. Employees were owed wages for several months and jumped off the building to demand their wages. 
The employees who were owed wages said that the leaders turned a blind eye to the employees' demands. The employees have elderly parents and young children to take care of, and they are also burdened with mortgages and car loans. They were on the front line during the Wuhan epidemic. The hospital's behavior is really chilling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 19, in Fengcheng, Jiangxi, a man said that he was beaten and had six or seven stitches, but the Hezhou police station released him and did not pay for his medical expenses. The man said: Is this a society ruled by law?
Netizens in the comment section suggested that he go to a "regular police station" to report the case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a Chinese man was suspected of bribing the customs when entering Indonesia. He stuffed 500,000 Indonesian rupiah (about 224 yuan) into his passport before entering.
When the man was checked at the airport, he handed the red passport to the staff. He also posted it online to show off.
This matter has caused heated discussions in Indonesia. Agus Andrianto, Minister of Immigration and Correctional Services, said that he is verifying the matter and will expel the Chinese man and send him a letter of refusal of entry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 20 (Released) Lawyer Zhang Jinghui posted a video saying that in criminal cases, the public security, procuratorate and court will suggest you plead guilty and accept punishment on the grounds of probation or non-prosecution. The reason for doing so is to cover up the lack of evidence in the case and the differences in legal relations. His client listened to the other party and pleaded guilty, but was eventually sentenced to actual imprisonment by the court. Lawyer Zhang Jinghui said that if you think you are innocent, you must insist on defending your innocence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wall Street Journal: Beijing says economy to grow 5% year-on-year in 2024, but various signs of weakness have led some economists to question the authenticity of the data.
China announced 24 years of economic growth of 5%, completing the official target, but some outside economists said that in contrast to the strong performance of the overall GDP data, a series of other data painted a weaker economic picture, such as consumer inflation, tax revenue and online spending. China's economy is still mired in the real estate downturn and is teetering on the edge of deflation.
Eswar Prasad, professor of trade policy and economics at Cornell University and former head of the International Monetary Fund in China, said: "These growth data are beyond credibility and do not help build confidence...
fullContent:
华尔街日报：北京表示2024年经济同比增长5% 但各种疲软的信号让一些经济学家质疑数据的真实性。
 中国公布24年经济增长实现5%，完成官方目标，但一些外部经济学家表示，与GDP整体数据强劲表现形成对比的是，其他一系列数据则描绘出一幅更为疲软的经济图景，比如消费者通胀、税收收入和线上支出表现乏力。中国经济仍深陷房地产低迷困境，并在通货紧缩边缘徘徊。
 康奈尔大学(Cornell University)贸易政策和经济学教授、国际货币基金组织(International Monetary Fund)前中国区负责人普拉萨德(Eswar Prasad)表示：“这些增长数据超出了可信范畴，无助于建立信心，也无助于改变中国经济举步维艰的局面。”
 总部位于纽约的研究机构荣鼎集团(Rhodium Group)利用这些数据和其他数据，对2024年中国经济增长做出了自己的估计。荣鼎集团预计2024年中国经济增长率约为2.8%，高于其估计的2023年2.4%的增速，但远低于中国国家统计局周五公布的官方数据。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Feedback from the public on the centralized procurement system:
"My colleague's son suffers from ADHD (Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder). Currently, imported drugs are no longer available. He switched to domestic drugs, but the efficacy is not good, resulting in the child being unable to go to school. (Currently, this post has been deleted by the platform)"
"My child received a week of infusion of domestic azithromycin and developed pneumonia. Later, I learned that domestic azithromycin was ineffective"
"The centralized procurement of antihypertensive drugs has reduced my patient's blood pressure from 176/75 to 221/98"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Professor Ouyang Haifeng of Xi'an International Medical Center Hospital talks about how he chooses "original drugs" or "generic drugs", and what the difference is between "original drugs" and "generic drugs".
